lyrics:
Doctor, doctor, give me medication,
my mind is going crazy
Doctor, doctor, be my salvation
and drive my spirit out of here
I scream, I shake, my pulse is rising quickly
Doctor, doctor, give me medication
and slow down my
Feels like my heart is gonna break,
but you have got the remedy
All through the night I'm kept awake,
and now I'm losing sanity
I am crying out loud for the cure
Doctor, doctor, give me medication,
my mind is going crazy
Doctor, doctor
